tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Even though I booked my appointment about 2 days back, I had to wait for more than 2.5 hours. I reached the hospital on time for my appointment but they still made me wait for so long. I kept asking the receptionist and she kept assuring me that they will send me next but still they made me wait for more than 2.5 hours. They said that some meeting was going on which is very unprofessional in my opinion. If a slot is not available or if they are not sending in patients according to their appointment timings, they shouldn’t take appointments. I had some prior engagements which I had to cancel because of such a long waiting period. The most annoying part is that this hasn’t happened for the first time. The last time I booked an appointment through Practo and went to see the same doctor in Nulife Hospital, I had to wait for about 3 hours. I thought it was a one time thing, but this is unacceptable, it’s like they don’t value our time at all. Another point I would like to highlight is that the hospital is under construction and it is very dusty, sitting on the same chair for almost 3 hours while the dust keeps flying in the same area is really irritating. The doctor was nice and patiently diagnosed me, but I would not recommend this hospital at all.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
So a little background..I've been diagnosed with PCOD earlier this year and even the Ultrasound tests all confirm it so. 
I shifted to Delhi some weeks back and wanted to check my current situation. After all the prior tests and meetings I was referred to her. So, I waited for about 2hrs and when it was my turn, she just viewed my results and completely invalidated my condition and said I just need to lose weight. ****** * **** ** ******* *** *********** ** **** ******* I don't recommend this doctor to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I have admitted this hospital due to some heart issues. I was glad that I took this decision otherwise I wouldn't be here. I was undergoing the treatment under Dr. Akshay. I must say that he is the most wonderful Doctor I have seen. He was very affectionate and courteous towards me and my family. He not only explained me well about my health issues but also assure me about each and everything in advance.Also special thanks to Dr. Shakuntala, she has an enviable standard of proficiency in her field, she also helped me lot during my stay in hospital. Me and my family are their old patients, and also refer this hospital to our friends and relatives. I am also grateful to Anju didi who refered me to them in first place.  All of their staff was also very nice and helpful .

review:
Doctor was very kind. He listened to the problem patiently and checked properly. Medicines recommended by the doctor were very helpful.I am very satisfied.Thnks for shakuntla kumar Ma'am she is very supportive and all staff members very professional and active staff. Responsive and involved in their duties. Took care of my child periodically till she got discharged **** ****** Doctors give your call proper time that is required to solve your queries. Reception people are so easy to communicate with,special mention to Ms. Kamla Ma'am and soniya Ma'am.Facilities are appreciable
Regrds and thnks-
Pooja mishra choudhary
The doctor was very professional and kind. Treated me well. I am satisfied with my treatment. Highly recommended.

Very disheartening to hear that. Please let me know why you were not satisfied and what more can be done. Will resolve your issues at the earliest. If another visit is needed, we can schedule that for you on a complimentary basis.
In this time of COVID Pandemic, we are strictly following all yhe protocols and mainly attending emergencies.
